feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX2B][Managed vSphere] - Storage maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 31, 07:30 - 22:00 UTC

Nov 27, 02:20 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer in RBX2B region.

Start time : 31/12/2025 07:30 UTC
End time : 31/12/2025 22:00 UTC
Service impact : There will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability, or virtual machines during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][Managed VMware Cloud Director] - Racks R805L16 incident notification
entry.content:
Nov 27, 09:41 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on the rack R805L16 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 27/11/2025 02:20 UTC
End time : 27/11/2025 09:40 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Nov 27, 05:40 UTC
Update - Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : We would like to inform you that a significant number of hosts are now operational.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Nov 27, 02:26 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director offer in RBX8, rack R805L16.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 27/11/2025 02:20 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All hosts in the rack R805L16 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their hosts located on the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2][Hosted Private Cloud] - Racks 31A16/31A17/31A18 maintenance notification
entry.content:
Nov 25, 06:36 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 24, 21:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 4, 21:44 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on hosts located in racks 31A16, 31A17 and 31A18.

Start time : 24/11/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 25/11/2025 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Hosts in the specified racks will be temporarily unavailable up to 9 hours during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be moving hosts in the specified racks from RBX2 to RBX7.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2b][Managed vSphere] - Cluster8345 incident notification
entry.content:

Start time : 25/11/2025 01:55 UTC
End time : 25/11/2025 05:01 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Nov 25, 03:15 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed vSphere offer on the specific cluster.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 25/11/2025 01:55 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Datastores located in Cluster8346 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to use their datastores of the specified cluster.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Nov 25, 02:24 UTC

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 25/11/2025 01:55 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Datastores located in Cluster8345 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to use their datastores of the specified cluster.
